CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The corresponding open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( I SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and PCE of the devices are also summarized in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. V OC - Open-circuit voltage
2. I SC - Short-circuit current
3. FF - Fill factor
4. PCE - Power conversion efficiency
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. V OC - Open-circuit voltage
2. FF - Fill factor

These are the only two entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| V OC |
| FF |

I have presented the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The corresponding open - circuit voltage ( V OC ) , short - circuit current ( I SC ) , fill factor ( FF ) , and PCE of the devices are also summarized in Figure 3.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. Open-circuit voltage (V OC)
2. Short-circuit current (I SC)
3. Fill factor (FF)
4. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)

These entities are mentioned in the paragraph as properties or values of the devices being discussed.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, my apologies for including irrelevant entities earlier. Here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. Fill factor (FF)
2. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)

These two entities are mentioned in the paragraph as properties of the devices being discussed, and they refer to the value of the material properties of the devices.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |

| Short-circuit current (I SC) |
| Fill factor (FF) |
